key_quotes.quote: We find that coral reefs provide $4 billion/yr in expected flood protection benefits and $35 billion/yr for 100-year storm events
Reef crests reduce wave energy by an average of 97%, with the majority of benefits accruing to Indonesia, Philippines, Malaysia, Mexico, and Cuba
Loss of just 1 meter of reef height doubles the expected flood damages to coastal properties
Our methods and findings can inform reef restoration priorities and insurance products for coastal resilience
